fields.tweet_response_text: Looks like Ohio State's offense is channeling the glory days of the 2002 Buckeyes. Expect a national championship buzz, unless they trip over an old-school flip phone.

fields.tweet_response_text: Prepare for a shiny new AI buddy that’ll likely make your old Palm Pilot look like a rock. Just don’t expect it to help you with your existential dread.
